data.text:
Runners from the UN joined the #AbbottDash5K & took to the streets of NYC to show their support for #ClimateAction on Saturday! 

Here's how you join them and #ActNow for our planet & all its people: https://t.co/hq6ZenTgyp https://t.co/QACGuRijy9

Young people will be front and centre at the #NairobiSummit on population & development - sharing bold ideas, shaping the conversation & leading the way forward.

Join the movement: https://t.co/9wT8xHK1ve  #ICPD2 https://t.co/dd8EB7sByw
Efforts to #EndImpunity for crimes against journalists and media workers are key to achieving open & inclusive societies and all the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/zBdPw5asrH https://t.co/4qEAr67hiR

Violence against women is a human rights violation & a public health concern.

@pahowho explains how the health sector can play a vital role in prevention & response: https://t.co/iavCvfHsDz https://t.co/F6mvopNjqB

"Without journalists able to do their jobs in safety, we face the prospect of a world of confusion and disinformation."

-- @antonioguterres on Saturday's #EndImpunity Day. https://t.co/yPxQ0tnvbl #KeepTruthAlive https://t.co/kYYOJ88nNO

This week, @antonioguterres visited the @UNTechBank, which supports the least developed countries with science, technology and innovation to help them achieve the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/fgC91TXDGP https://t.co/Q9JBlFxIP9

Get a glimpse inside the @CIJ_ICJ to learn more about its work to settle legal disputes between countries in this interview with the Court's newly-appointed Registrar. 🎧 https://t.co/S79WZbfL6h https://t.co/DNAIQqHYiO

Killing a journalist does not kill the truth.

Help @UNESCO #KeepTruthAlive on Saturday's #EndImpunity Day & every day: https://t.co/vjlkTS3Ias https://t.co/tw3L0xEr7P

Air pollution causes more deaths than:
- Alcohol use
- Physical inactivity

You can help to #BeatAirPollution:
- Be a public transport champ 🚃
- Choose a bike 🚴🏽‍♀️ or walk🚶🏻‍♂️ instead of driving 🚗
https://t.co/wtmJdjSiCl via @UNEP https://t.co/Bd9rjY6a4m

1000+ journalists were killed in the last 12 years for reporting the news & informing the public.

Saturday's #EndImpunity Day calls for greater accountability & justice. https://t.co/5ALQ9ktxZw https://t.co/ihJLXUd2Rw

Thank you @SydOperaHouse for showing your support for the #GlobalGoals!

Learn how the goals aim to improve the lives of people everywhere. https://t.co/hq6ZenTgyp https://t.co/KerOwtGJpJ

Happy birthday to Hello Kitty who came to September's #UNGA to show her support for the #GlobalGoals!

Here's how you can #ActNow for our planet & all its people: https://t.co/hq6ZenTgyp #FBF https://t.co/6b7X5ggvZ5

"We want to teach our children how to be the champions of tomorrow."

In a crowded classroom in a refugee camp in Ethiopia, Koat Reath is shaping the minds of young refugees with dreams of rebuilding South Sudan. https://t.co/Nx5zZ84ICI via @Refugees 

https://t.co/ZTlSp057r9
On Friday, @UN_CTED explores gender-sensitive counter-terrorism responses, the role of women in addressing terrorism & violent extremism and more. https://t.co/FX27qWwgQP https://t.co/YmwTUtU257

Happy birthday to Hello Kitty & thanks for all your support for the #GlobalGoals!

Check out Hello Kitty's recent visit to UNHQ, including a special greeting from @AminaJMohammed. #HelloGlobalGoals https://t.co/7Ny7AfKIpV
For the month of November, @UKUN_NewYork takes on the rotating presidency of the Security Council. https://t.co/YpsTtPECcT https://t.co/yTt1s8zaKb

Preservation of high mountain ecosystems is essential to global water, food and energy security. 

@WMO #MountainSummit wraps up with call for urgent #ClimateAction to protect our 🏔🏔🏔 https://t.co/aa3qC6JFKX https://t.co/DCDdHdRRWJ

"The resurgence of populism and the marginalization of minorities can contribute to isolation and radicalization, making people vulnerable to recruitment by extremists and terrorists." 

-- @antonioguterres at Istanbul Mediation Conference https://t.co/cNSlERhecK https://t.co/Olp9gVCXHS

Children in the US & beyond celebrating Thursday's #Halloween are collecting Trick-or-Treat donations that @UNICEF will use to help the world's most vulnerable kids. 

More from @UNICEFUSA: https://t.co/xTL8Im9YeS https://t.co/NKHE6BmFgy

From creating walkable cities to promoting smoke-free environments, on Thursday's #WorldCitiesDay, @WHO highlights actions cities can take to improve human health. https://t.co/L9fQv2wMzF https://t.co/3HW5nDCLGE

As children in the US and other places prepare for trick-or-treating, check out this #Halloween edition of the #GlobalGoals!

Here's how you can #ActNow for our planet & all its people: https://t.co/hq6ZenBF9P https://t.co/fsGga82pBy

"Cities generate more than 80% of global gross domestic product & as centers of education and entrepreneurship, they are hubs of innovation & creativity, with young people often taking the lead."

--@antonioguterres on Thursday's #WorldCitiesDay: https://t.co/FClgcmIhFI https://t.co/QywqP6hIju

Haiti: Deterioration of humanitarian access in past weeks as a result of widespread protests is limiting ability of UN & partners to deliver assistance to thousands of the most vulnerable Haitians. https://t.co/XafEi2Qy5E https://t.co/qyyuTjK0FN

Properly planned, designed, financed, developed, governed & managed cities can help achieve the #GlobalGoals.

More on Thursday's #WorldCitiesDay: https://t.co/j5TlgaWOFq https://t.co/5UOzMec7ZF
.@NobelPrize winners @NadiaMuradBasee & @DenisMukwege join launch of new Global Fund to help survivors of sexual violence reclaim their lives through justice and reparations. https://t.co/TmX4HF4lan

Thursday is #WorldCitiesDay!

Making cities inclusive, safe, resilient & sustainable is 🔑 to the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/yHWZKB0JvX https://t.co/KBmKLt10VQ

"A ruling of the Court can signal the starting-point for a new era in bilateral relations between disputing parties & mark an end to long-standing differences."

-- @CIJ_ICJ President Judge Abdulqawi Ahmed Yusuf in annual report to #UNGA. https://t.co/CO5A7t5uMt https://t.co/Cru2MSx9uO

“Today could become the beginning of something new, something meaningful for Syria & for Syrians everywhere. Together, we can make this come through."
-- @UNEnvoySyria at launch of Constitutional Committee for Syria. https://t.co/ynNknkHOJA https://t.co/GGjPHf8Oia

📸: “Let Us Beat Our Swords into Ploughshares”, 🎁 of USSR to UN is a disarmament symbol. 

As #DisarmamentWeek is coming to an end, find out how the UN continues to promote the elimination of nuclear & other weapons of mass destruction: https://t.co/HwXwt4Or3K https://t.co/PWJCVs1R8V

Around the world, youth are mobilizing for #ClimateAction - including young refugees who are far from home, but still taking steps to protect the planet. https://t.co/73Xft5Sg2y via @Refugees

https://t.co/HbPOvuhmpj

Breast cancer impacts 2.1 million women every year & causes the greatest number of cancer-related deaths among women.

@WHO has tips on how to reduce the risk:
➡️ Don't smoke
➡️ Limit or avoid alcohol
➡️ Stay physically active

More: https://t.co/Lt9cN2wvmM https://t.co/g8eLEigFet

New UNHQ photo exhibition spotlights plight of survivors through the eyes of young, emerging artists.

More on the UN's work to @endrapeinwar:  https://t.co/AHOQxhz6Rm https://t.co/jR7jfcgJZL

"4 decades of violence did not prepare me for this mission."

-- @WFP colleague shares his journey to one of the most remote parts of Afghanistan to reach some of the country’s most vulnerable families. #ZeroHunger https://t.co/2oV34ZIRIo

“The young people of Sudan have been a driving force for change. They have the right to be heard and to participate in decisions that affect their current & future well-being."

-- @unicefchief concluding visit to Sudan. https://t.co/wiYhgYK4Sc

From increasing access to reducing costs, @UNDP shares 5 ways it's leveraging solar power to help make universal healthcare a reality for all.
https://t.co/9fz67EgCUZ

"Change is coming at a pace that is too slow for the women & girls whose lives depend on it." -- @antonioguterres stresses vital role of women in promoting peace & security. https://t.co/HVMCuZcONX #UNSCR1325

International Solidarity Conference on Venezuelan Refugee & Migrant Crisis draws attention to serious & deteriorating political, human rights & socio-economic situation in the country. https://t.co/LuYWOEnVRA #Together4Venezuelans https://t.co/uiD0XD4DYb

Women are instrumental in promotion of justice, peace & security - yet, they continue to be sidelined in formal peace processes. 

@UN_Women shares stories showcasing the power of women as peacebuilders. https://t.co/5HrMHyR9WW #UNSCR1325
From #ClimateAction to clean water for all, new exhibit at UNHQ in NYC illustrates what the #GlobalGoals mean for people & planet. https://t.co/IpNQJVf4G6 https://t.co/jYUjZccMMm

Mountain regions
🏔 cover 1/4 of world's land surface
🏔 are home to 1.1 billion people
🏔 supply freshwater to over 1/2 of world's population.

@WMO #MountainSummit explores responses to impacts of climate crisis on high mountain regions. https://t.co/jgX8OLWwD8 #ClimateAction https://t.co/WZTo9MYuLa

From Ethiopia to Djibouti, Somalia, Eritrea & Sudan, @AminaJMohammed has been visiting the Horn of Africa region, where she has been meeting with people to talk about the importance of the #GlobalGoals, #ClimateAction, women's empowerment & more. https://t.co/gVtb6u86oa

Climate change is a major driver of conflict. @Lacroix_UN explains how the climate crisis impacts the work of @UNPeacekeeping around the world. https://t.co/fDUoYEbIS0 #ClimateAction https://t.co/attJ4zIEAq

The UN turns 75 next year, and we'll be hearing from people around the world describe their vision for a better future.

Listen to the great ideas these kids have! #UN75 https://t.co/JfH7Wl3DO1

4.5 million people have left Venezuela. 

International Solidarity Conference in Brussels aims to raise awareness of the crisis & show support for Venezuelans & host countries. https://t.co/gMpS5iCUlC via @UNmigration #Together4Venezuelans 

https://t.co/BtBtRmEp4o

"The future constitution of Syria belongs to the Syrian people and to them alone. It is all about meeting the aspirations of the Syrian people."

-- @UNEnvoySyria ahead of Wednesday's launch of Constitutional Committee for Syria. https://t.co/GFAvw53XRK https://t.co/Q2TcFmjPKD

Technologies such as 5G & satellite communications offer great promise to close the digital divide & advance the #GlobalGoals, @antonioguterres tells @ITU World Radiocommunication Conference. https://t.co/xTY5uCu3GB #ITUWRC https://t.co/LQYoT3Nlsp

Interested in job openings at the UN? 
Before submitting your application, check for these common mistakes:
➡️ Forgetting to include your native language
➡️ Failing to tailor your cover letter to the position 
➡️ Spelling errors
More tips from @UN_Careers: https://t.co/8GX0d8AGlX https://t.co/2Z4IYnyj13

Continues this week @UNGeneva: Human Rights Committee, 127th session (through 8 November). 

Reports & more here: https://t.co/0p2oSZoqeA #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/cmi3Ypvbnf
Continues this week at UNHQ: Commission on the Limits of the Continental Shelf, 51st session (through 29 November). https://t.co/KJ1jub78o4 https://t.co/em6VzKdrIw

Continues this week @UNGeneva: Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women, 74th session (through 8 November). 

Info, documents & more: https://t.co/KUu6uh9obR https://t.co/kWeWsLCKN8
Starts this week @UN_Vienna : International Narcotics Control Board, 126th session (through 15 November): https://t.co/6dBEcreq93 https://t.co/ShXFogYuTS

Happening this week:  World #CitiesDay,  International Day to #EndImpunity for Crimes against Journalists & much more. 

Full list here: https://t.co/aOqF6cdxHx https://t.co/zgcYpfiX2K

Climate change is a race we can and must win. 
It’s easy to take #ClimateAction:

🍎 Buy local or organic food
🔌 Unplug unused appliances
🚿 Use less hot water

💡 More ideas here: https://t.co/X0Shwfcd3n #ActNow https://t.co/uzXjLoRJ0y

In celebration of this week's #UNDay, the @qatar_phil orchestra put on a special performance at UNHQ in NYC. See what the composer had to say about how culture can fuel development. https://t.co/eXxJ9jpH5d https://t.co/ZhMeVMf4MR

E-waste can threaten human health & devastate environments if not dealt with properly - yet almost 80% is discarded in landfill, burned or illegally traded every year. 

@ITU explains the growing challenges of e-waste: https://t.co/OB4LS5wpQ6 https://t.co/Zf2C79tEsB

Images and sound archives protect and preserve humanity's stories.

Sunday is 🌍 Day for #AudiovisualHeritage: https://t.co/IsgPitLGmq https://t.co/Q02zFWIrRo

Every year, health workers from around the world reach 450 million children in more than 40 different countries with the polio vaccine.

Their tireless efforts are helping to #EndPolio. https://t.co/au8YEx8ONi - via @WHO #VaccinesWork https://t.co/bUlJrPOD8E
On Sunday's World Day for #AudiovisualHeritage, check out our AV Library where you can discover 74 years of UN history: https://t.co/KyDFaInD5r https://t.co/sCuRwVlRt3

.@MakeUpByCamila was at UNHQ this past week to talk about her partnership with @MichaelKors for the @WFP #WatchHungerStop initiative to provide meals for millions of people worldwide.

Here's what she had to say. https://t.co/xI9S77dtLX
.@WMO has called on governments to protect radio frequencies for potentially life-saving weather forecasting services. https://t.co/wEkDOWz2xP

Happy Diwali!

During the festival of lights, which is celebrated in India & by followers of many faiths across the world, clay lamps are lit to signify the victory of good over evil. 

Get Diwali @UNStamps here: https://t.co/jetZGj2rbR https://t.co/SRwFKqcX2t

Through images & sound, audiovisual heritage links the past to the future. 

More from @UNESCO on Sunday's World Day for #AudiovisualHeritage: https://t.co/l7xEUUNMLA https://t.co/79kZkp4fi1

For 74 years, the UN has been promoting disarmament, and the elimination of nuclear and other weapons of mass destruction remains a central objective. More on #DisarmamentWeek: https://t.co/defmQlDwJl https://t.co/ZQ64BL8sVF

On the path toward peace in Colombia, women are leading the way. 

In the aftermath of a civil war that raged there for 50+ years, meet the sheroes who are now central to restoring peace - as negotiators, prosecutors, and survivors. via @UN_Women

https://t.co/pOKEUiChaQ

At the Women's Resource Centre in Khazar, Azerbaijan this week, @UN_PGA saw first-hand how @UNDP's work is transforming the lives of hundreds of women in remote communities. 

More on the UN's work in the country: https://t.co/0K7We66a7Q #GlobalGoals https://t.co/9eTq1zOHJG

About 1/3 of food produced for human consumption worldwide is wasted, costing the global economy nearly US$750 billion annually. 

See what steps YOU can take to #StopTheWaste. - via @WFP 
https://t.co/SOfxF9PHRN

Hundreds of millions of people still live on less than US$1.90 a day. 

There is no way to achieve a just & equitable future without ending poverty. Latest from @UNDP: https://t.co/01YkwDHGWw #GlobalGoals https://t.co/DlNou8aCFQ

Gaps in family planning services linked to high rates of unintended pregnancies, says new @WHO study. 

More efforts are needed to ensure women access effective means of contraception that fit their needs & preferences. https://t.co/uLpbofLfyB https://t.co/N1F3BOpeT1

"The Non-Aligned Movement must continue to be a voice of reason & moderation, and must never fail to work, within the framework of the UN Charter, for peace, stability, human progress & justice." 

-- @UN_PGA at #NAMSummit. https://t.co/QiVhU1F17g https://t.co/ahFXrPzWhp
Good news for our planet and all its people: 27 countries pledge USD 9.776 billion for #ClimateAction to @theGCF for the next four years. https://t.co/ejb3kUhP77 https://t.co/HTrPNbCeQC

"I urge leaders everywhere to listen to the real problems of real people."

-- @antonioguterres on demonstrations taking place in many parts of the world. https://t.co/qucIDnBOTD https://t.co/YPl3blVl6i

Watch live as @antonioguterres speaks to reporters about the demonstrations taking place in many parts of the world. 

https://t.co/mbN3mKyS1F

It's Lead Poisoning Prevention Week.

Children can be exposed to lead at home, school & in playgrounds.

Keep children safe by using paints without added lead. https://t.co/1KwqU05Iyc via @WHO https://t.co/bKGOTmeFRm

Be smart.
Be critical.
Click wisely.
Always #ThinkBeforeSharing.

Details on the Global Media & Information Literacy week from @UNESCO: https://t.co/xPYeiRnMOq https://t.co/HVlqkhyMnZ

We will celebrate 75 years of working on behalf of everyone, everywhere at next year's @expo2020dubai!

The dedicated UN Pavilion will unite people for a brighter future. https://t.co/Hle7ebYxve https://t.co/sBh5lPd0Ha

"Today, we need the UN and multilateralism more than ever."

-- @UN_PGA celebrating #UNDay with students at @ADAUniversity in Azerbaijan. https://t.co/zi8hU2G8w2 https://t.co/rf8eu4LLwt

Happy #UNDay! 
See how people around the world celebrated in this Twitter Moment ⬇️

https://t.co/R8pEkxIDQ8

It may not always make the headlines, but every day the UN works to keep the peace & protect our planet and all its people.

More on Thursday's #UNDay: https://t.co/MGT7G5uPFL https://t.co/ng46FhHC9r

It's #DisarmamentWeek.

Just, peaceful & inclusive societies are key to achieving the #GlobalGoals and a brighter future for our planet & all its people. https://t.co/JrHny83wz4 https://t.co/FPqKwemUqn

As the UN prepares to turn 75, we want to hear your views on how to tackle the big challenges of our time. More about next year’s global #UN75 conversation: https://t.co/gBJDdJuWn3 https://t.co/uXQrdCj0bc

No child anywhere should suffer from a disease that can be prevented by a vaccine.

On Thursday’s #WorldPolioDay, @WHO explains the importance of eradicating polio. https://t.co/au8YEx8ONi #VaccinesWork https://t.co/RGj72A7bdi

Happy #UNDay!

At 74 years old, the UN continues to make a difference in the lives of everyone, everywhere. Get more UN facts here: https://t.co/0C9W7fMQkQ https://t.co/Dcq8tbSiae

The UN
➡️ works for bold #ClimateAction
➡️ pushes for human rights & gender equality
➡️ strives to maintain peace
➡️ delivers life-saving aid to millions
and much more.

-- @antonioguterres on Thursday's #UNDay https://t.co/WzNODzIzdk

 https://t.co/fMRbmK12MX

At next year's @expo2020dubai, the UN will showcase its efforts to create a better future & 75 years of working to make a difference in the lives of people everywhere. https://t.co/Yd0cbXxb7T https://t.co/8fKkPaKItJ

The #GlobalGoals are our blueprint to achieve a better and more sustainable future for all. Get details on Thursday's World Development Information Day:
https://t.co/dM52Zk5FsZ https://t.co/oNGHEaeZVb

The UN turns 75 in 2020 and we want to hear from YOU: What are your ideas for #ShapingOurFuture? Start planning for next year's global #UN75 conversation at: https://t.co/gBJDdJuWn3 https://t.co/HPVfJ2df3L

74 years of service to the 🌍.
17 #GlobalGoals for people & planet.

Ahead of Thursday's #UNDay, see how the UN makes a difference in the lives of people everywhere: https://t.co/yrG53kCASH https://t.co/oqj2rE1Xr1
On Thursday's World Development Information Day, see how YOU can take action for the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/jfqGESBGUv https://t.co/7AVlJxPCUQ

In Somalia, @AminaJMohammed praises country's efforts to achieve peace & security and emphasizes importance of women’s full participation for achieving inclusive & peaceful future. https://t.co/StTLOWZskN https://t.co/32ojGWnqFV

🇺🇳 Thursday is #UNDay! 🇺🇳

At 74 years old, the UN works for "we the peoples" --everyone, everywhere -- by
#ServingForPeace 
working for 
#ZeroHunger
#GlobalGoals
#CleanSeas
#ClimateAction 

#WithRefugees & #ForMigration
https://t.co/gjJwuPtXgi https://t.co/tXOauG78gj
https://t.co/z4fVX3nTRC

Join our UN Messengers of Peace @JaneGoodallInst and go #WildForLife on Wednesday's #SnowLeopardDay to help raise awareness of the need to protect endangered species. https://t.co/ZA9qyL9Cf3 #VanishingTreasures https://t.co/xmgo9uVOSh

4.5 million people have left Venezuela. 

Next week's International Solidarity Conference aims to raise awareness of the crisis, reaffirm global support & call for greater international cooperation. https://t.co/mjUcID7zgD https://t.co/DIaVKY66aF

The vast majority of those displaced by conflict & violence in Africa are women & children. The Kampala Convention is the first & only continent-wide binding treaty to protect internally displaced people. https://t.co/dMNxGIqB8k https://t.co/a8i7MgxLCc

There are only 4000-7500 snow leopards left in the world. 

On Wednesday's #SnowLeopardDay, join the Run Wild Challenge to see if you can keep up with a real snow leopard & raise awareness for endangered species: https://t.co/vTv6kzNyGC #WildForLife 

 https://t.co/VE4TIdfVIe

The UN emblem - pictured here in the #UNGA Hall - is an aspirational symbol, speaking to the hopes and dreams of people around the world for peace and unity. Find out more ahead of Thursday's #UNDay: https://t.co/dvBBPeY4Sc https://t.co/n7Bpsog1fP

Millions of older people with disabilities are facing discrimination & being left behind, says @UNHumanRights  expert.

Countries must take action to offer more support & counter social misperceptions. https://t.co/rTtncHjCiD #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/SzMdkpN6fe

Yemen: For only the second time in over a year, @WFP has been able to reach families in Durayhimi City to provide them with vital humanitarian aid, including 3 month food supply, water, medicine, nutritional supplements & hygiene kits. https://t.co/W7a7VkU951 https://t.co/PGyGSwP6UG

Children in Libya continue to pay the highest price as violence continues in western parts of the country.

Children are #NotATarget. 

https://t.co/oeXSD9J6pt #ChildrenUnderAttack https://t.co/MBAY7vN5j0
